option1.enName: Yes, I currently have such contracts
option1.frName: Oui, j’ai ce type de contrats actuellement.

option2.enName: Yes, I expect to in the future (within one year)
option2.frName: Oui, je prévois avoir ce type de contrats dans l’avenir (d’ici un an).

option3.enName: No, my business doesn't have FX hedging contracts
option3.frName: Non, mon entreprise n’a pas de contrats de change.

option4.enName: No, my FX contract provider doesn't require collateral
option4.frName: Non, mon fournisseur de contrats de change n’exige pas de nantissement.
option4.value: No, FX contract provider doesn't require collateral

option5.enName: No, and I'm not familiar with FX hedging contracts
option5.frName: Non, et je ne connais pas bien les contrats de change.
option5.value: No, not familiar with FX hedging contracts
